+ Keyboard Shortcut Ctrl-Alt-Down

Use [Ctrl-Alt-Down] in order to view the [history] window with the next word automatically selected.

++ See also

	* [Ctrl-H], [Ctrl-Alt-Right], [Ctrl-Alt-Left], [Ctrl-Alt-Up]
	* KeyBindings


[:page:PageFooter][icon:key][alias:Ctrl-Alt-Down][short_hint:View history: select next]
